mapper.select: SELECT a.auctionNum, a.title, a.minSalary, a.maxSalary, p.personImage, p.nickName FROM auction a JOIN person p ON a.id = p.id LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
select a.* , p.* from auction a JOIN person p ON a.id = p.id WHERE a.id = #{sellerId} ORDER BY case when a.state = '진행중' then 1 when a.state = '종료' then 2 ELSE 3 END, a.endDate DESC;

select a.* , p.* from auction a JOIN person p ON a.id = p.id WHERE a.id = #{sellerId} STR_TO_DATE(a.endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{filterDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY case when a.state = '진행중' then 1 when a.state = '종료' then 2 ELSE 3 END, a.endDate DESC;

select a.*, p.* from auction a join person p on a.id = p.id where id=#{sellerId} and STR_TO_DATE(a.endDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') order by a.state and a.endDate;
